medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began prior to the patient's visit for ERCP, with jaundice and light-colored stools noted. The pain was not associated with any obvious aggravating or relieving factors. The patient also reported feelings of nausea after the ERCP procedure.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, GERD, left mastectomy for breast cancer, cholecystectomy
medical_history.family_history: Sister with unspecified condition. No known GI malignancies.
